name: Quality Control
description:
You're in charge of Quality Control.

Send any broken items to the bin with your company issued Big Puncha™.

You will gain points for correctly sorting broken items from unbroken items.

Quality Items found in the bin will deduct from your score, but Unsuitable items that are shipped will earn you a STRIKE.

Just remember...three strikes and you're out! 

Notes

Made as part of Trijam #89, hours used:

Ben - 3.5h

Drew - 2.5h

Credits

Programming: Ben Lee (https://itch.io/profile/garystrousers)

Art: Drew Wilson (https://itch.io/profile/andrewwlsn77)

Made Using
  • Godot Engine
  • GB SFX
  • CRT shader for Godot
  • Paint.NET
  • Piskel
